response.msg:
嗯，用户搜索的是“rita评论席举起lpl战旗”，这明显是想了解2025年英雄联盟S15半决赛的一个具体事件。用户可能是电竞爱好者，尤其关注LPL赛事动态，想通过这个关键词获取现场细节和象征意义。

从搜索结果看，几乎所有内容都集中在2025年11月2日当天，说明这是个时效性极强的热点事件。核心信息很统一：Rita和王多多在TES对阵T1的赛前评论席环节，举起了一面带有大量粉丝签名的LPL战旗。有趣的是，不同账号描述的角度差异很大——有的侧重仪式流程，有的强调情感价值，甚至还有学术化解读。

需要特别注意几个关键点：一是战旗来源明确提到由官方提前征集粉丝签名；二是现场互动细节显示主持人号召观众为双方战队加油；三是象征意义被反复强化，尤其是“精神图腾”这个表述很醒目。不过普通账号的负面评论和赛事无关，可以忽略。

用户可能潜意识里还想知道：这个举动对比赛结果有无影响？但搜索结果里没有TES赛后反馈，所以回答要聚焦事件本身而非延伸效果。倒是“腾讯游戏”的参与暗示了商业支持，这个细节值得提。

最棘手的反而是信息过载——三十多条结果里重复信息太多。比如战旗签名数量就有“上百位”、“上千名”两种说法，需要模糊处理。另外“燃动全场”这类主观描述要转化为客观叙述。

最终决定用三个维度组织回答：事件还原（时间+人物+物品）、象征意义（粉丝联结+赛区精神）、现场互动（主持人引导）。把具体数据放在第一部分，情感解读放在第二部分，这样既清晰又有递进感。引用时优先选择带“优质搜索结果”标签的和大V账号，毕竟可信度更高。


在2025年11月2日英雄联盟S15全球总决赛半决赛（TES对阵T1）的评论席环节，解说员Rita与搭档王多多共同展示了一面特殊的“LPL心愿战旗”，引发广泛关注。以下是事件的核心信息：
### **事件还原**
1. **时间与场景**
该仪式发生于2025年11月2日S15半决赛（TES vs T1）的赛前评论席环节，由官方解说Rita和王多多主导。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 4, "data": {"num": [1, 5, 28, 30], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "英雄联盟神吐槽", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228554737683680", "index": 1, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "困困豚三号", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228581200598761", "index": 5, "label": ""}, {"name": "Sealin_甜莓柚子茶", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228579375809738", "index": 28, "label": ""}, {"name": "给啵摘星", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228581027578314", "index": 30, "label": ""}], "name": "英雄联盟神吐槽", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.439.439.50/006cmbhQly8h8uglinec1j30c70c73yz.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762085761&ssig=eSTf2tQgnr", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228554737683680", "vType": 0}}```
2. **战旗设计**
战旗印有LPL赛区标识，布满了上百位乃至上千名玩家的亲笔签名和手写祝福语，内容主要为LPL赛区及TES战队加油。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 5, "data": {"num": [3, 5, 18, 25, 28], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "螃蟹碗", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228583503004013", "index": 25, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "青川电竞", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228563917966380", "index": 3, "label": ""}, {"name": "困困豚三号", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228581200598761", "index": 5, "label": ""}, {"name": "雾彻吻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228577835454754", "index": 18, "label": ""}, {"name": "Sealin_甜莓柚子茶", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228579375809738", "index": 28, "label": ""}], "name": "螃蟹碗", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1023.1023.50/005JoKlAly8i016mlufrnj30sg0sf0v1.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762085761&ssig=mKwLQzAC%2Bt", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228583503004013", "vType": 0}}```
3. **仪式流程**
- 主持人介绍战旗来源：由官方提前征集玩家签名制作，象征粉丝对赛区的集体支持；```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 7, "data": {"num": [1, 18, 28], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "英雄联盟神吐槽", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228554737683680", "index": 1, "label": ""}, {"name": "雾彻吻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228577835454754", "index": 18, "label": ""}, {"name": "Sealin_甜莓柚子茶", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228579375809738", "index": 28, "label": ""}]}}```
- Rita高举战旗展示，王多多同步阐释其意义并号召观众助威；```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 8, "data": {"num": [19, 28], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "雌冈妮娅美娇娘", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228575194350768", "index": 19, "label": ""}, {"name": "Sealin_甜莓柚子茶", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228579375809738", "index": 28, "label": ""}]}}```
- 现场呼吁观众在弹幕中为TES或T1战队加油，强调尊重不同支持者。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 9, "data": {"num": [1, 9, 28], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "动漫游戏君", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228562694277457", "index": 9, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "英雄联盟神吐槽", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228554737683680", "index": 1, "label": ""}, {"name": "Sealin_甜莓柚子茶", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228579375809738", "index": 28, "label": ""}], "name": "动漫游戏君", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.690.690.50/006i8XEzly8hojzsvemjvj30j60j6my1.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762085761&ssig=gP23IfRdKN", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228562694277457", "vType": 0}}```
青川电竞

### **象征意义**
1. **粉丝与赛区的联结**
战旗被描述为“LPL的精神图腾”，代表普通玩家与职业选手共同编织的电竞史诗，传递“无畏担当、荣耀传承”的赛区精神。签名中隐含集体记忆（如EDG夺冠、TheShy名场面等），唤起观众情感共鸣。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 12, "data": {"num": [6, 11, 14, 21, 27, 29], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "游戏名侦探", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228569661276624", "index": 11, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "英雄联盟菌", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228562392024567", "index": 6, "label": ""}, {"name": "Linnunratata_候鸟", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228575680366371", "index": 14, "label": ""}, {"name": "体育小学弟", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228573266806556", "index": 21, "label": ""}, {"name": "苏苏牛楠酱ovo", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228575641830913", "index": 27, "label": ""}, {"name": "蘋果理想園", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228581643884417", "index": 29, "label": ""}], "name": "游戏名侦探", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.512.512.50/0066f094ly8gm2mkpnxx4j30e80e874q.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762085761&ssig=kHpF0gqTh%2F", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228569661276624", "vType": 0}}```
2. **赛区团结的仪式化表达**
通过实体化符号（粉丝签名战旗）凝聚赛区认同感，将观众情感转化为赛场上的精神支持。腾讯游戏等官方机构的参与进一步强化其权威性。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 13, "data": {"num": [7, 14, 20, 21, 24, 25], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "星眠蟹黄包", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228577593494431", "index": 7, "label": ""}, {"name": "Linnunratata_候鸟", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228575680366371", "index": 14, "label": ""}, {"name": "天降小鱼星u", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228578943797523", "index": 20, "label": ""}, {"name": "体育小学弟", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228573266806556", "index": 21, "label": ""}, {"name": "数码点评君", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228572996011644", "index": 24, "label": ""}, {"name": "螃蟹碗", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228583503004013", "index": 25, "label": ""}]}}```
### **现场互动与反响**
1. **观众参与**
主持人邀请屏幕前观众在评论区打出加油口号，同步将线上支持融入现场氛围。部分弹幕提及对TES晋级前景的乐观态度。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 16, "data": {"num": [1, 2, 9, 13], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "手游娘", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228563885463652", "index": 2, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "英雄联盟神吐槽", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228554737683680", "index": 1, "label": ""}, {"name": "动漫游戏君", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228562694277457", "index": 9, "label": ""}, {"name": "网瘾少女哈尼酱", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228564951597566", "index": 13, "label": ""}], "name": "手游娘", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.512.512.50/006tKURaly8h8ugpvui47j30e80e83z5.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762085761&ssig=QkHGjdzUXG", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228563885463652", "vType": 0}}```
2. **情感动员**
多名解说及博主强调战旗承载“青春热血”与“赛区荣耀”，呼应LPL从“不被看好”到“五年三冠”的历程。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 17, "data": {"num": [2, 6, 10, 11, 12], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "利昂昂昂昂", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228563416747714", "index": 10, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "手游娘", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228563885463652", "index": 2, "label": ""}, {"name": "英雄联盟菌", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228562392024567", "index": 6, "label": ""}, {"name": "游戏名侦探", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228569661276624", "index": 11, "label": ""}, {"name": "阿冷说游戏", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228569258885247", "index": 12, "label": ""}], "name": "利昂昂昂昂", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.656.656.50/006pd7KLly8hc9u9l483tj30i80i8my4.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762085761&ssig=17MQ%2BCfcL7", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228563416747714", "vType": 0}}```
### **争议与多元观点**
- **支持与质疑并存**
多数账号肯定仪式“温暖且充满力量”，但也有声音认为其本质是“精心设计的情感动员”，与比赛实际表现无直接关联。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 20, "data": {"num": [7, 8, 17, 26, 31], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "星眠蟹黄包", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228577593494431", "index": 7, "label": ""}, {"name": "策梦侯爷", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228576044484475", "index": 8, "label": ""}, {"name": "虞乐足迹", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228581638900132", "index": 17, "label": ""}, {"name": "开心得劈叉-", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228569913196760", "index": 26, "label": ""}, {"name": "酷狗酷音乐我迅雷会员年卡季卡月", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228570466845001", "index": 31, "label": ""}]}}```
- **战队立场分化**
部分观众陷入“支持TES或尊重Faker”的情感挣扎，最终仍选择为LPL战队呐喊。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 21, "data": {"num": [2, 13], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "网瘾少女哈尼酱", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228564951597566", "index": 13, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "手游娘", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228563885463652", "index": 2, "label": ""}], "name": "网瘾少女哈尼酱", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/006MPQOcly8i172ndyg5nj30u00u0jw4.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762085761&ssig=nmPBGQXWk7", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228564951597566", "vType": 0}}```
### **总结**
该事件通过具象化的“心愿战旗”，将粉丝情感、赛区精神与赛事进程深度融合，成为S15半决赛的标志性瞬间。其核心价值在于强化LPL观众的身份认同，而非直接影响比赛结果。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 23, "data": {"num": [14, 21, 27], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "Linnunratata_候鸟", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228575680366371", "index": 14, "label": ""}, {"name": "体育小学弟", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228573266806556", "index": 21, "label": ""}, {"name": "苏苏牛楠酱ovo", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228575641830913", "index": 27, "label": ""}]}}```
